faq.question: What are the features of the Reputation page?

faqlist.faq: On this page you can view a character's standing with each faction he or she has come in contact with. Like the in-game reputation panel, each reputation will be depicted by a colored bar. The character's current reputation levels appear on the right of each bar.

faq.question: Where can I go to find out more about these different factions?

faqlist.faq: Some factions have corresponding pages in our online Game Guide. These factions' names will be direct links to their pages and will appear as blue text.

faq.question: What are all the different reputation levels and how much reputation does it take to progress from one level to the next?

faqlist.faq:
Here is a list with the required reputation points:
0/36000 – Hated to Hostile
0/3000 – Hostile to Unfriendly
0/3000 – Unfriendly to Neutral
0/3000 – Neutral to Friendly
0/6000 – Friendly to Honored
0/12000 – Honored to Revered
0/21000 – Revered to Exalted
